name: CXSetHeldCallAction
desc: An encapsulation of the act of placing a call on hold or removing a call from hold.

items.name: init(call: UUID, onHold: Bool)
items.desc: Initializes a new action for a call identified by a given UUID, as well as whether the call is on hold.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action to place a call on hold with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var isOnHold: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the call is placed on hold.
